changelog.2.3.7: Fix installer to preserve custom content, add infrastructure-* to deprecated list
changelog.2.3.6: Convert commands to JSON-output pattern for inline formatting, add audit/debug/backup scripts
changelog.2.3.5: Add check-update.sh and apply-update.sh for update command
changelog.2.3.4: Add proposal-based skill/agent creation from patterns, fix grep exit code handling
changelog.2.3.3: Add manifest-based updates to remove deprecated files while preserving user content
changelog.2.3.2: Fix update command to stop when versions match, use cache buster for version check
changelog.2.3.1: Add session hooks (start/stop/post-tool), automatic update check, agents inherit model
changelog.2.3.0: Add subagent orchestration, 12 built-in agents, agent-creator skill, 50+ tech mappings
changelog.2.2.0: Add /reflect command, automatic correction capture, Project Facts in CLAUDE.md
changelog.2.1.0: Move distributable content to dist/, add symlinks for self-dogfooding
changelog.2.0.0: Restructure repo - root IS .claude content, framework in rules/claudenv.md
changelog.1.0.6: Add skill-creator skill with init, validate, package scripts
changelog.1.0.5: Restructure skills to follow Agent Skills spec (references/, assets/)
changelog.1.0.4: Rename skills, fix descriptions for auto-invoke
changelog.1.0.2: Add /claudenv:mcp command for MCP server management
changelog.1.0.1: Fix permissions format to use Bash(command:*) syntax
